header.title: TweeDuizenden
header.lead: A website to record scores for a game called TweeDuizenden.

overview.title: Overview
text: On this website you can record the scores for the game TweeDuizenden.
You can also save these scores and view previous played games.
Use the button below to start a new game.

rules.title: Rules
text: If you're not familiar with the rules of this game, it's highly recommanded that you read them first.
